table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Adder A
table.description: This table is added to idle airflow when the minimum activation threshold based on vehicle speed is reached

table.name: Engine Speed
Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Adder B
table.description: This table is added to idle airflow when the minimum activation threshold based on vehicle speed is reached

table.name: Engine Speed
Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Adder
table.description: This table is an RPM by Engine Coolant table which is added to idle airflow when the minimum activation threshold based on vehicle speed is reached

table.name: Engine Speed
Coolant Temp
Idle Speed Stability A
table.description: This table contains a MAP related correction to idle airflow based on the delta between target idle and actual idle.

table.name: Idle Speed Error
Engine Speed Delta
Idle Speed Stability B
table.description: This table contains a MAP related correction to idle airflow based on the delta between target idle and actual idle.

table.name: Idle Speed Error
Engine Speed Delta
Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Adder Active Veh Speed A
table.description: This table sets the activation threshold for the Idle Aifrlow Min Target Decel Adder table.

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Adder Active Veh Speed B
table.description: This table sets the activation threshold for the Idle Aifrlow Min Target Decel Adder table.

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Min Airflow A
table.description: Idle airflow will be limited to a minimum value as determined by this table, for a time determined by Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Activation Max Mode Counter

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Min Airflow B
table.description: Idle airflow will be limited to a minimum value as determined by this table, for a time determined by Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Activation Max Mode Counter

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Activation Max Mode Counter
table.description: Determines how long Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Initial Idle Min Airflow limit is applied.

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Ramping Adder Decreasing
table.description: This table is added to target idle airflow depending on the direction of error.

table.name: Idle Airflow Min Target Decel Ramping Adder Increasing
table.description: This table is added to target idle airflow depending on the direction of error.
